attributes.action: UK must not be legally bound by a World Health Organisation WHO pandemic treaty.
attributes.additional_details:
The WHO is currently preparing an international agreement on pandemic prevention, preparedness and response.

We believe the public must be furnished with the full ramifications of what and how any pandemic treaty could affect them, and be given a public vote on whether the UK should sign up, before the UK Government signs up to this.
attributes.background: To protect lives, the economy and future generations from future pandemics, the UK government can adopt its own  pandemic prevention, preparedness and response by immediately closing all ports of entry into the UK and set up quarantine camps at these entry points WITHOUT the need of a UN Treaty.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you would like the UK Government not to agree to an WHO pandemic treaty, or if you'd like a referendum on any treaty. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
